duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage engineering systems, system standards, and system outputs related to Computer-Aided Design (CAD), Building Information Model (BIM), and project management software.
Develop engineering systems, document management, and program information standards for managing and storing electronic copies of drawings, specifications, and other project-related documents.
Execute solution implementation and configure project deliverables independently or collaboratively using engineering software.
Coordinate model production, 3D Coordination, and associated 2D CAD drafting.
Review models and model files for compliance with agency and AIA BIM standards, policies, guidelines, and workflows.
Stay up to date on emerging BIM trends to evaluate and recommend new and existing tools and solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
